Add Skins package support. ([4d49774](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/4d49774)) - Add support for "st-file-icons" package. ([e493311](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/e493311)) - Add support to st-file icons and update icons. Please check the readme file. ([8224e68](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/8224e68)) - Brand new theme variant: Palenight ([113b313](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/113b313)) - New “material_theme_arrow_folders” setting ([4c22ee0](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/4c22ee0)), closes [#998](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/issues/998) - New “material_theme_bullet_tree_indicator” setting ([cf0f513](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/cf0f513)) - Now the minimap viewport use the current accent color ([0aa5b69](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/0aa5b69)) ### BREAKING CHANGES - From this release Material Theme use the `st-file-icons` package to display file type icons. Please install it and restart Sublime Text.

name: v3.0.0
body:
🎉 NEW MAJOR RELEASE WITH NEW COLOR SCHEMES

📣 Please open a new issue only for a bugfix.
📣 If you don't like the new schemes use the old ones (now out of support).

  Main improvements:
  ➼ A completely new and improved color schemes
  ➼ A new theme builder that support variables and modules. The UI themes are now dynamic with variables.
  ➼ A new scheme builder that support variables and allows an easy customization/fix
  ➼ Oceanic schemes will not be provided anymore. If you want to use it, just download and customize the package.
  ➼ The previous color schemes are the new "old" ones
  ➼ Material Theme now support @3x retina display
  ➼ New schemes color palettes (Check the readme file)

name: v2.1.6
body:
### Bug Fixes
- Fix php block entity name ([8a3e881](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/8a3e88177123c9c386144e405d361ccacde6297d)), close #827

### Features
- Now you can check the official changelog
- Add extensions overrides ([7d57cb8](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/7d57cb8b73c0205404fda9aa2c300babac2ae5be))
- Add a lot of new file icons and update the old ones ([933dedf](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme/commit/933dedf3fcab01d6de1e4fba1b1ad30dcdfba6a9))

name: v2.1.5
body: Many conflicts fix

name: v2.1.4
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ Fix a lot of UI color glitches
  ➼ Fix all accents colors mistakes (I hope)
  ➼ Fix "Unable to decode overlay_bar_horizontal.png" console error (removed asset declaration)

🏮 COLOR SCHEMES

  ➼ Add color to html attributes in jsx scope
  ➼ Edit color for `this` variable in jsx and js files.

name: v2.1.3
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ New .pug file icon (Jade will be renamed Pug, more info here https://github.com/pugjs/pug/issues/2184)
  ➼ Fix some filetype icons.

🏮 COLOR SCHEMES

  ➼ Fix italic comments for the dark scheme
  ➼ Fix/add italic html tag attributes
  ➼ Remove italic style from css classnames

name: v2.1.2
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ New .jade file icon
  ➼ Fix some file icons
  ➼ Fix "material_theme_disable_folder_animation" folder color whith the new accent colors

🏮 COLOR SCHEM
  ➼ Update Oceanic Next color schemes
  ➼ Add italic style to code comments
  ➼ Add italic stule to the html attributes

name: v2.1.1
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ Add file icon to .swig files
  ➼ Update .twig file icon
  ➼ Fix pink autocomplete matched text color

🏮 COLOR SCHEME

  ➼ Fix material theme lighter active guide color (Thanks @stawberri)

name: v2.1.0
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ New setting to set a small search panel ("material_theme_compact_panel": true)
  ➼ New find/replace regex icon
  ➼ New npm file icon
  ➼ 3 KABOOM! Completely new accent color. Pink, Blue, Cyan

🏮 COLOR SCHEME

  ➼ Fix active guide color with Lighter theme.
  ➼ Fix #id selector color for css/sass/scss

name: v2.0.9
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ Removed Langs folder with extensions overwrite (This should fix the issue with the less syntax)

name: v2.0.8
body:
### UI THEME

  ➼ Removed file extension preferences
  ➼ Fix autocomplete selected row color (low contrast from text)

### COLOR SCHEMES

  ➼ Fix JSON color highlight up to 30 levels deep (thanks to @jonsuh)
  ➼ Add support for ESLint and Babel config file types (thanks to @jonsuh)
  ➼ Fix Gruntfile keyboard block comment shortcut (thanks to @jonsuh)
  ➼ Fix HTML tags color inside php files.
  ➼ Fix Lighter theme contrast issue (#676)

name: v2.0.7
body:
🏮 COLOR SCHEMES

  ➼ Update all Oceanic Next color Schemes from original repositories.
  ➼ Fix some JS and Python color highlight issues
  ➼ Fix html attributes highlight when have parent have childrends

name: v2.0.6
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ Add support to the new status bar switch panel button (bottom left) from dev biuld 3101
  ➼ Fix tree highlight indicator to match current accent color

🏮 COLOR SCHEME

  ➼ Fix ruby symbols color highlight
  ➼ Fix html attributes color clitch in some cases

name: v2.0.5
body:
🏮 UI THEME

➼ Fix tabs and sidebar heading height when use both small tabs and disabled tabs scrolling

name: v2.0.4
body:
🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ Fix accent color for automplete popup and progress bar dialog (update popup)
  ➼ Fix commet toggle for gulpfiles (thanks to @opjlmi)
  ➼ Darker tab separator is now inverted and more visible
  ➼ Revisited yellow accent to match yellow appbar

🏮 COLOR SCHEME

  ➼ Add support.stype color highlight

name: v2.0.1
body:
👉 Version 2.0.1 👈

---

🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ Minor fix to contrast mode setting to make consistency with new addon [Material Theme - App bar](https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme-appbar)
  ➼ New indigo accent color ( **material_theme_accent_indigo": true** )

name: v2.0.0
body:
Material Theme for Sublime Text 3
https://github.com/equinusocio/material-theme

🎉🎉🎉🎉🎉
Happy 5K stars and 90K installations!! I love you all! ( except those who open issues without first reading the readme file )
🎉🎉🎉🎉🎉

👉 Version 2.0.0 👈

---

🏮 UI THEME

  ➼ Increase sidebar spacing and add new setting to enable old compact sidebar ( "material_theme_compact_sidebar": true )
  ➼ Update some filetype icons
  ➼ Fixed blade icon not showing after the latest updates
  ➼ Revisited tabs size and centering

🏮 COLOR SCHEME

  ➼ Oldest color scheme will now be available under OLD folder ( Packages/Material Theme/schemes/OLD/Material-Theme-*.tmTheme )
  ➼ Sass & SCSS lang files removed to avoid issues with the main packages.

🏮 CORE

  ➼ Add a gulp/js compiler to the main theme structure. Now to edit this theme we have to clone develop branch and edit source (./src) files, install dependencies by run `$ npm install` and then compile by run `$ gulp`

``` json
}
```

name: v0.9.0
body:
## UI improvements and refinition
- Fixed scrollbar stretching pattern
- New darker theme version, use `"theme": "Material-Theme-Darker.sublime-theme"` to activate it
- Fixed darker version assets
- New assets structure
- New widgets structure
- Better scalable theme structure

## Syntax Color (testing)
- New line highlight color
- Markdown colors fixed and updates

name: v0.7.0
body:
## UI improvements and refinition
- Fix folder icons in the tree view
- Fix quick panel (projects manager) and mini quick panel style
- Fix scrollbars (standard and overlay) (i suggest to use `"overlay_scroll_bars": "enabled",` setting for a better experience)
- Removed unused assets

## Syntax Color (testing)
- Syntax color highlight implementation (based on Oceanic https://github.com/voronianski/oceanic-next-theme)
- Fix color for indent guidelines and gutter line numbers
- Changed color for selection and linehighlight

name: v0.5.0
body:
## UI imporvements and refinition
- Added scrollbars style (i suggest to use `"overlay_scroll_bars": "enabled",` setting for a better experience)
- Added tooltips style —Reference: http://www.google.com/design/spec/components/tooltips.html#tooltips-usage)
- Add some missing icons
- Fix highlight match icon in find/replace panel
- Removed unused assets
- Fix code fold icon
- Fix input padding and margin (find/replace)—Reference: http://www.google.com/design/spec/components/text-fields.html#text-fields-single-line-text-field)
- Added style for popup windows (update check and download)
- Removed Roboto font dependecies from UI (now you will see the original font)

name: First beta relase
body:
#UI IMPLEMENTATION

- Basic color scheme
